metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27784 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in the Linux kernel, where accessing a deallocated instance in printer_ioctl() printer_ioctl() tries to access of a printer_dev instance. However, use-after-free arises because it had been freed by gprinter_free().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27784` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-13-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-aws - 5.19.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-azure - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-gcp - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-13-lowlatency - 5.19.0-1007.7

No subscription required
